PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-09012003-06-10ND,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAppointment of COMMANDER PETER JAMES LAMONT, an officer of the Canadian Forces who is a barrister or advocate of at least 10 years standing at the bar of the Province of Ontario, as a military judge, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective June 16, 2003.
